data.text:
Record Book

- Single Game

- 4th - Strikeouts - 15

- Single Season

- T-3rd - Strikeouts - 92

- T-6th - Strikeouts - 83

- T-6th - Saves - 4

- T-10th - Games Started - 12

- T-12th - Total Games - 17

- T-23rd - Innings Pitched - 73.0

- Career

- 5th - ERA - 2.66

- 7th - Strikeouts - 196

- T-10th - Saves - 4

- T-21st - Complete Games - 4

Career Summary

- 46 Appearances - 23 Games Started

- 7-7 - 2.66 ERA - 159 IP - 196 K's - 4 Saves - .197 BAA

- 2018 Centennial Conference Pitcher of the Year

- 2018 D3baseball.com Second Team All-Region

- 2017 & 2018 First Team All-Centennial

- 2017 Second Team ECAC All-South

- 2018 Team Captain

2018

- Team Captain

- Centennial Pitcher of the Year; First Team All-Centennial

- D3Baseball.com Second Team All-Region

- Centennial Pitcher of the Week on 4/9

- Led the team and conference with a career-high 19 striekouts, which tied for the third most in a single-season in program history.

- Finished with a career-low 1.97 ERA which led the team and the conference.

- Went 4-4 in 12 appearences making 11 starts.

- Led the team with 73 innings pitched during which he gave up just 15 extra-base hits (only one home run) and 28 walks.

- Surrendered just 24 runs (16 earned) on 47 hits.

- Gave up five hits or less in nine of 11 starts and gave up zero runs in four starts on the year.

- Pitched three complete games with one shutout.

- Batters hit just .184 against him during the year.

- Struck out a career-high 15 batters on 4/8 against Muhlenberg in a 1-0 complete game victory during which he surrendered just four hits and one walk. The 15 Ks are the fourth-most in a nine inning game in program history.

- Struck out 13 batters in the Centennial Conference Championship game against Swarthmore on 5/6.

- Finished his career with 196 strikeouts to rank seventh all-time.

2017

- ABCA Third Team All-Mid-Atlantic Region

- D3Baseball.com Second Team All-Region

- ECAC Second Team All-South

- First Team All-Centennial Conference

- Made a team-leading 12 starts on the season, earning a 3-2 record on the mound

- Struck out 83 and walked only 26 in 65.0 innings pitched

- Held opponents to a .203 batting average, the best among Hopkins starters

- His 3.18 ERA ranked fifth on the team

- Struck out 12, 13 and 14 batters in consecutive starts against Old Westbury (3/18), Plymouth State (3/23) and Swarthmore (4/1)

- Pitched a complete game shut-out against Swarthmore (4/1)

- Gave up one or zero hits on four outings, against Stevens (3/12), Old Westbury (3/18), Wahington College (4/28) and Lesley (5/18).

2016

- Appeared in 17 games for a total of 17 innings pitched

- Led the team with four saves on the season

- Posted a 3.18 ERA and recorded 3.18 ERA, four saves and 14 strikeouts

- Struck out a season-best two batters against UW-Stout (3/17).

2015

- Pitched in five games, all out of the bullpen

- Struck out a season-best three batters in his first-career appearance against Olivet (3/13). High School

- Led team to section championship as senior at De La Salle

- Earned team's Cy Young award as a senior

- Led team to 21-7 record during final prep season. Personal

- Son of Ana Maria and William Ross

- has one sister, Rachel

- majoring in environmental engineering.
